Package design.aeonic.nifty.api.aspect

Interface AspectProvider<T,CTX>

Type Parameters:
T - the type of the implementing class; ie BlockEntity
CTX - the context type: passed when obtaining an aspect; ie for blockentities this is Direction
All Known Subinterfaces:
AspectProviderBlockEntity, AspectProviderEntity, AspectProviderItem
All Known Implementing Classes:
MachineBlockEntity, MachineBlockEntityRedstoneControllable
public interface AspectProvider<T,CTX>
Represents a game object that can contain and expose aspects; for instance, a blockentity.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static <P extends AspectProvider<?, ?>>
    Optional<P>
    as(Class<P> type, Object object)
    If the given object is an aspect provider, returns it as such; otherwise returns an empty optional.
    default <A> Aspect<A>
    getAspect(AspectType<A> type, CTX context)
    Gets an aspect of the given type, or an empty aspect if the provider doesn't have one or if it can't be accessed with the given context.
    default T
    self()
